Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan will play their first-ever bilateral T20I series against India, starting on 11th January 2024 at IS Bindra Stadium in Mohali.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series will be played over three matches in Indian cities: Mohali, Indore, and Bengaluru.Afghanistan's spin attack is expected to be a key threat against India's batting lineup.Indian batsmen have strong strike rates, with players like Rinku Singh (180.68), Yashasvi Jaiswal (159.25), and Shubman Gill (145.11) highlighted for their performance.
